title: Is My Fiancée Being an Entitled Princess About Our Wedding Budget? (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Rachel Cruze discuss:

Dealing with an entitled fiancee who wants her dream wedding,

Pulling from retirement to pay off debt,

Roth vs. cash management accounts,

Spending $25k on a vacation,

When to pull from social security.


Support Our Sponsor:

Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
